name: NATIONAL COALITION FOR ASSITIVE REHAB TECHNOLOGY (NCART)
description: An association of suppliers and manufacturers of complex rehab technology products and services.
sampleDescriptions: Develop a legislative and regulatory strategy to lobby and obtain relief for the Complex Rehab Technology industry (H.R. 3730, H.R. 750).
